articles.description: Sprng Ujjvala Energy, NTPC Renewable Energy, Coal India, and TP Saurya were declared winners in the GUVNL's auction to purchase power from ...
articles.content: Sprng Ujjvala Energy, NTPC Renewable Energy, Coal India, and TP Saurya-a Tata Power subsidiary – were declared winners in the Gujarat Urja Vikas Nigam Limited’s (GUVNL) auction to purchase power from… [+3596 chars]
